segments.text: I notice the boy reaching into the cookie jar, standing on that unstable stool.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He’s going to fall, and the woman is too busy drying dishes to notice.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl is just standing there, waiting for her cookie like nothing is wrong.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The water is overflowing, and the floor is getting slippery.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman is completely unaware of the mess around her.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy is stretching so far, he’s going to lose his balance any second now.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can’t believe how reckless this whole situation is.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl seems so innocent, just waiting for her treat.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The stool looks like it’s about to tip over, and no one is going to catch him.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I hope the woman turns around and sees what’s happening before it’s too late.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The whole scene is just a disaster waiting to happen.
segments.speaker: PAR
